      public WorkerView​(UndecoratedWorker worker)
      Creates a WorkerView with the specified attributes.

  • Method Details

    • isPositionSet

      public boolean isPositionSet()
      Checks the position of the worker with the WorkerView.
      Returns:
      A boolean: true if the position is set, otherwise false.

    • getPosition

      public Tile getPosition()
      Gets the Tile of the worker with the WorkerView.
      Returns:
      The Tile where the worker at issue is positioned.

    • getState

      public int getState()
      Gets the state of the turn of the worker with the WorkerView.
      Returns:
      The state of the turn of the worker at issue.

    • setState

      public void setState​(int state)
      Sets the state of the turn of the worker with the WorkerView.
      Parameters:
      state - The state that needs to be set for the worker at issue.

    • getMovableList

      public java.util.List<Tile> getMovableList()
      Gets the list of tiles where the worker with the WorkerView can move to.
      Returns:
      The current list of Tile objects where the worker at issue can be moved to.

    • setMovableList

      Sets the list of tiles where the worker with the WorkerView can move to.
      Parameters:
      movableList - A list of Tile objects where the worker at issue can be moved to.

    • getBelongToPlayer

      public int getBelongToPlayer()
      Gets the player which the worker with the WorkerView belongs to.
